# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="22219-102">Odgovarjanje na Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="22219-103">Odgovoriti na eno sporočilo hkrati:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="22219-104">Na seznamu sporočil, izberite sporočilo, ki ga želite odgovoriti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="22219-105">V zgornjem desnem kotu podokna s sporočilom, izberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="22219-106">**Odgovor** ali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="22219-107">**Odgovori vse**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="22219-108">Vnesite sporočilo in izberite **Pošlji**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="22219-109">Za samodejno odgovarjanje na vsa sporočila:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="22219-110">pojdi k</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="22219-111">**Nastavitve** > **Poglej si vse Outlookove nastavitve** > **Mail** > **samodejne odgovore** razkleniti [Nastavitve samodejne odgovore](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="22219-112">Izberite toggle **vklopiti pošiljanje samodejnih odgovorov** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="22219-113">Potrdite polje **Pošlji odgovori samo v časovnem obdobju** omogoča:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="22219-114">Samo Pošlji odgovori, ko izberete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="22219-115">Če ne določite časovno obdobje, samodejnega odgovora ostaja na dokler ga izklopite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="22219-116">Blok koledar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="22219-117">Samodejno zavračanje povabil nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="22219-118">Upada in preklicati mojih srečanjih v tem obdobju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="22219-119">V polje za sporočilo vnesite sporočilo poslati ljudi v času, ko ste odsotni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="22219-120">Le poslati odgovore za stike, potrdite potrditveno polje **Pošlji odgovori samo stiki** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="22219-121">Izberite **Shrani**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="22219-122">Več informacij o [samodejno posredovanje v Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="22219-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
